title: CLEAR_PED_TASKS_IMMEDIATELY
content:
0xAAA34F8A7CB320980xBC045625// ClearPedTasksImmediately
void CLEAR_PED_TASKS_IMMEDIATELY(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: Ped id.Immediately stops the pedestrian from whatever it's doing. The difference between this and CLEAR_PED_TASKS is that this one teleports the ped but does not change the position of the ped.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for CLEAR_PED_TASKS_IMMEDIATELY
ClearPedTasksImmediately(ped)
